    Sass Textmate Bundle with alternative syntax

    If you prefer the alternative Sass syntax:

      .comments    
    .pagination
      margin: 10px 0 10px 0
      text-align: center
      font-size: 14px
      span
        color: #fff
        margin: 0 1px 0 1px
        padding: 4px 6px 2px

    then you should check out my small Textmate Bundle on Github.
